title: What is the technology use in our life? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many uses of technology in our lives. Although it has its own merits and demerits, we cannot neglect the impact of the technology advancement in our life. Simply speaking , consider lifestyle of a person who lived 50 years before with our lifestyle today. I personally think that materialistic possessive nature of humans has dramatically increased now.But we cannot simply deny what good technology advancement did to humans. Example may vary from medical to communication to vast areas where technology definitely improved our life styles

What a dumb question. See for yourself around. If you are not living in a cave or forest then you must be surrounded by the gifts of technology it self. The clothes you wear , are they same as people wore in 1990s. Your shoes , your TV, Your mobile, your flush toilet, your fridge, washing machine, bike, car ….et cetra.
